meanings.definition: A pair of small speakers worn over the ears to listen to audio from a computer, music player, etc.
meanings.sent1: I love using my headphones to listen to music on my phone.
meanings.sent2: She always wears her headphones when she goes for a run.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the headphones but couldn't figure out how to put them on.
meanings.sent4: His headphones were like a barrier, blocking out the noisy world around him.
meanings.sent5: The bright red headphones stood out in the sea of black electronic devices.

meanings.definition: A device consisting of a headband with earphones attached, used for listening to audio privately.
meanings.sent1: My new headphones have a comfortable headband that doesn't hurt my ears.
meanings.sent2: The headphones are perfect for enjoying music without disturbing others.
meanings.sent3: He pretended his headphones were a crown and walked around the house like a king.
meanings.sent4: The headphones whispered sweet melodies directly into her ears.
meanings.sent5: With his headphones on, he felt like he was in his own little world.
